name: Trevor Noah
description:
When Jon Stewart announced he was leaving The Daily Show, speculation ran rampant. Who will replace the beloved host?

When the dust settled, an heir appeared: Trevor Noah. Who?

Noah, a South African-born comic, is one of The Daily Show's newest correspondents. He is not exactly a household name, and his selection bypassed many thought more worthy.

Whatever, fine. We're all for new voices. One small problem. Here are some of Noah's tweets (sic):


Almost bumped a Jewish kid crossing the road. He didn't look b4 crossing but I still would hav felt so bad in my german car!

Behind every successful Rap Billionaire is a double as rich Jewish man.

Messi gets the ball and the real players try foul him, but Messi doesn't go down easy, just like jewish chicks.


There are a bunch of others in a similar vein. And you know what, we're offended, and not because Noah is antisemitic (heck, according to him, his mother converted to Judaism and threw him an unexpected bar mitzvah). We're offended because Noah is supposed to be a comedian.

Then why aren't his jokes funny?
